text:
Email building question: does anyone here simply build their emails outside of HubSpot and then upload the HTML as a file in order to send?

Our emails are incredibly custom and our typical workflow is to build in MJML, export to HTML, and upload the HTML to Iterable (current system)--which works great. I know this isn't the preferred route within HubSpot + adding dynamic/smart content becomes extraordinarily limited, but curious if others do it this way.
Hi <@U018L5T14R0> I struggled with the same issue
I built this little scripting tool to write mjml components and have them converted into HubSpot custom components that you could then put together with the drag and drop
but short story, its a painâ€¦but once its working!
